Question: Guangzhou ShiPeng technology Co., LTD CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Guangzhou Shipeng Technology Co., LTD

Product: Exoskeleton Series

- Wearable intelligent equipment technology
- Exoskeleton with human sign detection and AIoT platform
- Developed by a team with over 60% master and doctoral students
- Features international leading level parameters
- Widely used in emergency rescue, forest fire fighting, load-bearing marching, outdoor work, production line assembly, and industrial logistics
- Aimed at improving load-bearing capacity, effective working time, and avoiding cumulative muscle injury
- Available in various models with hydraulic drive
- Comprehensive after-sales service network with over 2000+ service outlets in China
Summary_cn:
广州市石鹏科技有限公司

产品：外骨骼系列

- 可穿戴智能设备技术
- 具有人体信号检测和AIoT平台的外骨骼
- 由60％以上硕士和博士团队开发
- 具有国际领先水平的参数
- 广泛应用于紧急救援、森林灭火、负重行进、户外工作、生产线组装和工业物流
- 旨在提高负载承载能力、有效工作时间并避免肌肉损伤的累积
- 有多种型号可选，采用液压驱动
- 在中国拥有超过2000多个服务网点的全面售后服务网络
